## Checklist

### For Learning Content

- [ ] Code compiles and runs without errors
- [ ] New concepts are documented in comments or README
- [ ] Progress tracker (`learning/[topic]/progress.md`) is updated
- [ ] Topic README (`learning/[topic]/README.md`) reflects current state

### For Lesson Completion

- [ ] Learning report generated in `reports/[topic]/[YYYYMMDD]-report.md`
- [ ] Report follows the template in `.github/templates/learning-report.md`
- [ ] Next lesson plan created/updated in `learning/[topic]/lesson-plan.md`
- [ ] Skills acquired are marked in topic progress README

### For Agent/Template Changes

- [ ] Changes align with the teaching philosophy (guide, don't give answers)
- [ ] Templates are well-documented with placeholders
- [ ] Prompts produce consistent, quality output

### General

- [ ] Commit messages follow [conventional commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/)
- [ ] No sensitive information or credentials included
- [ ] Build artifacts are not committed (check `.gitignore`)

## Notes for Reviewer
